themes: Concerns about privileging vocal minority voices
Recognition of progress for historically underfunded organizations
Skepticism about overreliance on AI and artificial deadlines
Importance of direct engagement and questioning
key_phrases: ASK QUESTIONS to the resources within the department
do not throw away years of important and impactful work
a small sector of the community has the privilege of being the loudest
arts commission has presented specific adjustments to the existing programs
Organizations that were historically underfunded due to systemic barriers have received transformational funding
Talk directly to them and ask the questions around improvements and changes
AI is not going to paint the whole picture
do not put all your faith into it just to meet a fabricated deadline
barriers_identified: Systemic barriers leading to historical underfunding
Dominance of privileged, vocal minority in decision-making
solutions_proposed: Implement specific adjustments recommended by the arts commission before starting over
Engage directly with historically underfunded organizations for feedback
Do not rely solely on AI for decision-making
